snippet: All April long, before each lunch and dinner shift at Gramercy Tavern, the employees take turns reciting poems for one another before they hit the floor.
abstract: All April long, before each lunch and dinner shift at Gramercy Tavern, the employees take turns reciting poems for one another before they hit the floor.

headline.main: And on the Special Staff Menu, Poetry
headline.print_headline: At Gramercy Tavern, the Special for April Is Poetry
